metadata.title: CVE-2013-3630 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Moodle through 2.5.2 allows remote authenticated administrators to executearbitrary programs by configuring the aspell pathname and then triggering aspell-check operation within the TinyMCE editor.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
